SELECT u.uid,s.sid,did,evaluate,submanager,leavedays
FROM t_user u LEFT JOIN t_sec_detail sd ON u.`uid` = sd.`uid` LEFT JOIN t_section s ON s.sid = sd.`sid` WHERE u.`uid` = #{uid} AND s.sid = #{sid} order by od asc
SELECT u.uid,s.sid,evaluate,rid,secname FROM t_user u JOIN t_sec_rebel sr ON u.uid = sr.`uid` JOIN t_section s ON sr.sid = s.`sid` WHERE u.uid = #{uid} AND s.`sid` = #{sid} order by od asc
SELECT (u.`status`/tmp.secnum) process,status,secname,detailname FROM (SELECT COUNT(*) secnum FROM t_section) tmp,t_user u ,t_section s WHERE u.status = s.od and uid = #{uid}
select s.sid,secname,detailname,cursection from t_user u join t_user_section us on u.uid = us.uid join t_section s on s.sid = us.sid and u.uid = #{uid}
